verses.roman:
ānandita hañā śacī karena randhana
sukhe bhojana kare prabhu lañā bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: ānandita hañā—being pleased; śacī—mother Śacī; karena—does; randhana—cooking; sukhe—in happiness; bhojana—eating; kare—does; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā—accompanied by; bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees.
translation: Mother Śacī cooked with great pleasure, and Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, along with the devotees, accepted the prasāda with great pleasure.
